    	See what's happening with students and alumni of the College of Business.Chico State TodayCollege of BusinessStudent-Managed Investment Fund Takes on a Bull Market In the Midst of a Successful Career of Catching Bad Guys, Military Vet  Pursues Online MBAChico State Receives Transformational Gift to Support New College of Business BuildingFond Farewell: Business Professor Emeritus Casey DonohoWorth Sharing: Chase Selected as a Fulbright US ScholarAlumna Uses International Education, Business Acumen to Build Cascade of SuccessCollege of BusinessTehama Hall 301 530-898-6272bus@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/cobSupport our College(opens in new window)Program PortfolioDepartmentsInformation Systems, Finance & AccountingManagementMarketingMBA Program
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
